name: A simple 2D platformer game
description:
A simple 2D platformer game is a simple 2D platformer, and that it !

In this game, you will play in a auto-generated world by templates. In this world you can meet specials objects like a jumpad, a platform or even teleport point.

The camera will slowly move to the right, if the player goes out of the camera vision or the player touches any red tiles, the game is over.

This game is for the moment in developpement. if you want to report a bug or give your opinion about, you can join the discord server juste here:

Nova Code Studio Server
